org.unbunt.ella.compiler
Class ParserHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.unbunt.ella.compiler.ParserHelper

public class ParserHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class providing static methods for:

  • parsing complete scripts
  • parsing SQL literals for named parameters

Method Detail

parseScript

public static Block parseScript(Scope initialScope,
                                java.lang.String filename)
                         throws GenericParseException
Compiles the given EllaScript program into an executable form.

Parameters:
initialScope - the scope information to use during compilation.
filename - the name of the file containing the program to compile.
Returns:
the executable representation of the program.
Throws:
GenericParseException - if any errors occur during compilation of the program.

parseScript

public static Block parseScript(Scope initialScope,
                                SimpleResource resource)
                         throws GenericParseException
Compiles the given EllaScript program into an executable form.

Parameters:
initialScope - the scope information to use during compilation.
resource - the resource containing the program to compile.
Returns:
the executable representation of the program.
Throws:
GenericParseException - if any errors occur during compilation of the program.

parseParamedSQLLiteral

public static RawParamedSQL parseParamedSQLLiteral(RawSQL stmt)
                                            throws GenericParseException
Parses the given sql statement for named parameters.

Parameters:
stmt - the sql statement.
Returns:
the sql statement and it's named parameters.
Throws:
GenericParseException - if any errors occur during parsing of the statement.
